info.title: AGI Judd's Idea Catalog API
info.description: Transform LLM conversations into actionable Linear projects

get.description:
Initiate Google OAuth login flow.

Returns:
    Redirect response to Google OAuth authorization URL

Handle Google OAuth callback.

Args:
    response: FastAPI response object
    code: Authorization code from Google
    state: State parameter for verification
    error: Error parameter if OAuth failed

Returns:
    Redirect response to frontend dashboard or login page

Get current authenticated user information.

Args:
    request: Current request

Returns:
    Current user information

Check authentication status.

Args:
    request: Current request
    session_token: Session token from cookie

Returns:
    Authentication status and user info if authenticated

post.description:
Log out current user.

Args:
    response: FastAPI response object
    session_token: Session token from cookie

Returns:
    Success message

schema.title: Response Logout Api Auth Logout Post

delete.description:
Clean up expired sessions (admin endpoint).

Returns:
    Cleanup result message

schema.title: Response Cleanup Expired Sessions Api Auth Cleanup Delete

get.description: Get chat history for a conversation's project draft.

schema.title: Response Get Chat History Api Conversations  Conversation Id  Project Draft Chat Get

post.description: Stream chat messages with real-time updates via Server-Sent Events.
Import a conversation from a share URL and automatically generate a project draft with streaming.

get.description: Get a paginated list of all imported conversations.

schema.title: Response List Conversations Api Conversations Get

get.description: Get a specific conversation by ID with complete details.

schema.title: Response Get Conversation Api Conversations  Conversation Id  Get

delete.description: Delete a specific conversation by ID.

schema.title: Response Delete Conversation Api Conversations  Conversation Id  Delete
Response Update Conversation Api Conversations  Conversation Id  Patch

get.description:
Get the current summary for a conversation.

Prefers the imported conversation summary, falls back to chat summary, then to
concatenated imported chat messages if neither exists.

schema.title: Response Get Conversation Summary Api Conversations  Conversation Id  Imported Chat Summary Get
Response Update Conversation Summary Api Conversations  Conversation Id  Summary Patch

post.description: Webhook endpoint for importing conversations from Slack.

schema.title: Response Import From Slack Api Conversations Import Slack Post

post.description:
Upload a file attachment for a conversation.

Args:
    conversation_id: ID of the conversation
    file: File to upload (multipart/form-data)
    llm_model: LLM model to use for processing
    llm_provider: LLM provider to use for processing

Returns:
    JSON response with file metadata

Raises:
    HTTPException: If validation fails or upload fails

schema.title: Response Upload File Api Conversations  Conversation Id  Files Post

get.description:
List all file attachments for a conversation.

Args:
    conversation_id: ID of the conversation

Returns:
    JSON response with list of file attachments

Raises:
    HTTPException: If conversation not found

schema.title: Response List Conversation Files Api Conversations  Conversation Id  Files Get

get.description:
Download a file attachment via temporary signed URL.

Args:
    file_id: ID of the file attachment

Returns:
    Redirect response to S3 signed URL

Raises:
    HTTPException: If file not found or download fails
Get all available LLM providers and their supported models.

schema.title: Response Get Llm Providers Api Llm Defaults Providers Get

get.description: Get the current default LLM settings for a specific prompt type.

schema.title: Response Get Llm Defaults Api Llm Defaults  Prompt Type  Get

put.description: Update the default LLM settings for a specific prompt type.

schema.title: Response Update Llm Defaults Api Llm Defaults  Prompt Type  Put

get.description:
Get the active LLM prompt for a given type.
Returns the prompt from database if available, otherwise indicates default is being used.

schema.title: Response Get Llm Prompt Api Llm Prompts  Prompt Type  Get

post.description:
Create or update an LLM prompt for a given type.
This will deactivate any existing active prompt of the same type.

schema.title: Response Create Llm Prompt Api Llm Prompts  Prompt Type  Post

delete.description:
Deactivate the active LLM prompt for a given type.
This will revert to using the default prompt from code.

schema.title: Response Delete Llm Prompt Api Llm Prompts  Prompt Type  Delete

get.description:
Get the default LLM prompt for a given type.
This always returns the hardcoded default prompt, ignoring any custom prompts.

schema.title: Response Get Default Llm Prompt Api Llm Prompts  Prompt Type  Default Get

get.description: Get the project draft for a conversation.

schema.title: Response Get Project Draft Api Conversations  Conversation Id  Project Draft Get

patch.description: Manually update a project draft's title and description.

schema.title: Response Update Project Draft Api Conversations  Conversation Id  Project Draft Patch

get.description: Get all versions of a project draft for a conversation.

schema.title: Response Get Project Draft Versions Api Conversations  Conversation Id  Project Draft Versions Get

post.description: Recover a previous version by creating a new version with the same content.

schema.title: Response Activate Project Draft Version Api Conversations  Conversation Id  Project Draft Versions  Version Id  Activate Post

post.description: Create a new Linear project for a conversation.

schema.title: Response Create Project Api Conversations  Conversation Id  Project Post

get.description: Get the Linear project for a conversation.

schema.title: Response Get Project Api Conversations  Conversation Id  Project Get
